attributes.action: Ignore the petition that supports animal testing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because if they bothered to investigate hard enough they would already know that a)there are modern and more effective methods like computer models and tissue research and b) that 92% of drugs tested on animals are still found to be inappropriate for humans. Visit BUAV.org and decide if you want to sign this!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ignore the petition that supports animal testing."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15921.asp

Prime Minister's Office
